text: The 1969–70 snooker season was a series of snooker tournaments played between July 1969 and April 1970. The following table outlines the results for the season's events. __TOC__ ==Calendar== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" |- ! colspan="2" width=40 align="center"| DateDates use the month day format ! !
